entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries over southern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries over southern sections in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
